thread.title: Mayonnaise Is The Worst And I Want To Scream It From The Rooftops
thread.title_full: Mayonnaise Is The Worst And I Want To Scream It From The Rooftops

author: Christopher Hudspeth
title: Mayonnaise Is The Worst And I Want To Scream It From The Rooftops
text:
View this image ›
Bigacis / Getty Images ID: 10666107 2. All it takes is a tablespoon of your vile, revolting, offensively thick, sickeningly creamy existence to thoroughly ruin an entire meal. View this image ›
jenniferinnn / Via instagram.com ID: 10666259 3. You look and feel disgusting. Are you white or yellow? Are you cream or jelly? View this image ›
Kenmind77 / Getty Images ID: 10666295 4. There are some twisted individuals out there who’ll put you places you don’t belong, like on French fries… View this image ›
rizwanbodla / Via instagram.com ID: 10672721 5. …or an omelette. View this image ›
cat22183 / Via instagram.com ID: 10673011 6. And, in one of the most disturbing acts in the history of food, someone put you (and peas) on pizza. View this image ›
@FOX152 / Via Twitter: @FOX152 ID: 10673101 7. Your moistness makes buns soggy… View this image ›
midtown_grill / Via instagram.com ID: 10666491 8. Your bland taste hides the succulence of a beef patty. View this image ›
sammsterboi / Via instagram.com ID: 10666493 9. And frankly, your gel-like texture grosses me the fuck out. View this image ›
Natikka / Getty Images ID: 10666530 10. Every time a restaurant puts you on my burger without permission, I want to call the police and report this injustice. View this image ›
Katarzynabialasiewicz / Getty Images ID: 10666383 11. People have even tried to make you in different forms, but *SHOCKER* you’re still trash. View this image ›
Walmart / Apple ID: 10667393 12. The same thing goes for mixing mayonnaise with ketchup to create a combo sauce. No, go away mayo. Your awfulness nearly trumps ketchup’s greatness. You’re trying to ride ketchup’s coattails to tasting decent. Sad! View this image ›
Karimitsu / Getty Images ID: 10667418 13. In closing, I wish you were self-aware so all of this could be said to your stupid face, or lid, or whatever. View this image ›
Etiennevoss / Getty Images ID: 10667555 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com!
